account.changePhoneError: Error: Unable to change phone number

account.passwordDescription: Password must contain 8-16 characters, a lowercase and uppoercase letter (a-z, A-Z) and a number (0-9)

account.beenWithUs: You’ve been with us since ${since} and we really appreciate the time we spent together.
account.ikhlasDigitalSadaqahDesc: Donate confidently and conveniently with IKHLAS Sadaqah
account.notLoggedIn: You’re not logged in at the moment
account.cantDelete: We can't delete your account as there's ${credits} left in your credit account

account.digitalIslamicLifestyleEcosystemDesc: Digital shariah services like Zakat, Qurban, Aqiqah and Fidyah at your fingertips
account.sentInvitation: We’ve sent an activation link to your email
account.accountDeletionWrongEmail: Wrong email selected, please use correct email to continue your account deletion
account.limitedOtp: For the safety of your account, we’ve limited the number of times you can request for a new OTP.
account.accountWillBeDeletedOn: This account will be deleted on ${date}. When you log in, we’ll restore the account again.
account.setPasswordSub: You'll use this password to access your account
account.aboutToDeleteAccountPassword: You’re about to delete your account. Please enter your password so we know it’s you.
account.invalidOtp: That’s an invalid OTP. Please try again. You have ${attempsLeft} attempts left.
account.accountDeletionInProcess: Your account deletion is in process
account.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.logoutErrorTip: Oh no! Your session has expired due to inactivity
account.resetTipContent: Send code via SMS. Your verification code is sent by SMS to +{} {}
account.wantToDelete: Do you want to delete your account?

account.checkProfileDialogMessage: Please finish creating your user profile
account.sadToLetGo: We're sad to see you go
account.verificationLimitReached: Uh-oh, you’ve reached the limit to request for OTP
account.maximumOtp: You’ve reach the maximum allowed attempts. Request a new OTP and try again.
account.resendEmail: Didn’t receive any email? Please check your spam folder or

account.aboutToDeleteAccountSocialMedia: You’re about to delete your account. Please authorise this action by signing in with your social sign-ins below.
account.aboutToDelete: You're about to delete an airasia account & you'll be leaving behind ${points} airasia points.
account.nameErrorMessage: Name must be in English alphabets (A-Z) only. Special characters or symbols are not allowed
